addons.name: Argo Smart Routing
addons.description: Argo intelligent routing is a service that uses optimized routes across the Cloudflare network to deliver responses to your users more quickly, reliably, and securely. Argo includes: Smart Routing, Tunnel, and Tiered Caching.

addons.name: Network Interconnect
addons.description: Connect your network infrastructure directly to Cloudflare's network for a more reliable and secure experience than connecting over the public Internet.

addons.name: Load Balancing
addons.description: Load Balancing safeguards from service disruptions with local and spherical traffic load balancing, geographic routing, server health checks, and failover, ensuring the continuous availability of your critical resources.

addons.name: Video Stream
addons.description: Cloudflare Stream makes streaming high quality video at scale, easy and affordable.

addons.name: Network Interconnect
addons.description: Connect your network infrastructure directly to Cloudflare's network for a more reliable and secure experience than connecting over the public Internet.

addons.name: Browser Isolation
addons.description: Faster than any legacy remote browser. Natively integrated in the Cloudflare Zero Trust platform policy builder, allowing administrators to allow, block, or isolate any security or content category and application group.

addons.name: Cloudflare Images
addons.description: Store, resize, and optimize images at scale with Cloudflare Images

addons.name: Automatic Platform Optimization
addons.description: Switch to a single plugin for CDN, intelligent caching, and other key WordPress optimizations with Cloudflare's Automatic Platform Optimization. Turn it on and go (up to 300% faster).
addons.price: From $5/mo with Free Plan. Included in other plans.

addons.name: Cache Reserve
addons.description: Improve cache hit ratios by automatically storing  cacheable files in Cloudflare's persistent object storage buckets and eliminate egress costs from unnecessary requests.
addons.price: Cost based on data volume stored.

recommendationData.title: Application Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Free Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Free Application Services plan because you indicated that you have a personal or hobby web application and can self-serve when you need support.

recommendationData.title: Application Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Pro Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Pro Application Services plan because you're likely have non-urgent support needs. This plan comes support via tickets only.

recommendationData.title: Application Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Business Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Business Application Services plan because you might need faster support. This plan comes with support via tickets and online chat.

recommendationData.title: Application Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Enterprise Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Enterprise Application Services plan because you might need the fastest support possible. This plan comes with support via all channels, including 24x7x365 access to a live expert.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic Transit)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic Transit product because you indicated that you want to protect your network against DDoS attacks.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic WAN)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic WAN product because you indicated that you want to replace your MPLS WAN.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic Firewall)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic Firewall product because you indicated that you want to deploy a network firewall as a service.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic Transit + Magic WAN)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic Transit and Magic WAN products because you indicated that you want to protect your network against DDoS attacks and replace your MPLS WAN.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic Transit + Magic Firewall)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic Transit and Magic Firewall products because you indicated that you want to protect your network against DDoS attacks and deploy a network firewall as a service.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic WAN + Magic Firewall)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic WAN and Magic Firewall products because you indicated that you want to replace your MPLS WAN and deploy a network firewall as a service.

recommendationData.title: Network Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Magic Transit + Magic WAN + Magic Firewall)
recommendationData.description: Protect and accelerate a corporate network
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Magic Transit, Magic WAN, and Magic Firewall products because you indicated that you want to protect your network against DDoS attacks, replace your MPLS WAN, and deploy a network firewall as a service.

recommendationData.title: Zero Trust Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Free Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Free Zero Trust plan because you need to protect less than 50 users and are okay self-serving when you need support.

recommendationData.title: Zero Trust Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Standard Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Standard Zero Trust plan because you indicated that you would like to be able to email or chat with us online when you need support.

recommendationData.title: Zero Trust Services
recommendationData.subTitle: (Enterprise Plan)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Zero Trust Enterprise plan because you indicated that you would like to speak to a live person when you need support.

recommendationData.title: Developer Platform
recommendationData.subTitle: (Workers)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Workers product because you indicated that you're building a back end API or serverless function.

recommendationData.title: Developer Platform
recommendationData.subTitle: (Pages)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Pages product because you indicated that you're building a front end application.

recommendationData.title: Developer Platform
recommendationData.subTitle: (Workers + Pages)
recommendationData.recommendation: We recommend our Workers + Pages products because you indicated that you're building a full stack application.

planFeatures.title: Free Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure and accelerate your personal or hobby website.

planFeatures.title: Pro Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure and accelerate your professional, non-business-critical website.

planFeatures.title: Business Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure and accelerate applications for your small business operating online.

planFeatures.title: Enterprise Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure and accelerate applications for your small business operating online.
coreFeatures: 24x7x365 support via tickets, chat, and phone
Access to all Cloudflare products and add-ons

planFeatures.title: Magic Transit
planFeatures.description: Protect your data centers and network infrastructure against DDoS attacks
coreFeatures: Mitigate most attacks in under 3 seconds
Integrate via BGP routing and GRE encapsulation
Native integration with L7 services (CDN, WAF, Bot Management, etc.)
Support for all IP services (TCP, UDP, IPSec, VoIP, custom protocols)

planFeatures.title: Magic Firewall
planFeatures.description: Enforce consistent network security policies across your entire WAN
coreFeatures: Static firewall rules for your entire network for any device, location (branch or HQ), or application
Allow or block traffic based on: protocol, source or destination IP and port, packet length, bit field match

planFeatures.title: MagicWAN
planFeatures.description: We recommend our Magic WAN product because you indicated that you want to replace your MPLS WAN.
coreFeatures: Global presence in 200 cities across 100+ countries
Interconnects with > 9,800 networks, major ISPs, cloud services, and enterprises
Connect using a variety of on-ramps, including Anycast GRE tunnels, direct connection, forward-proxy, and encrypted (Argo) tunnels
Unified management plane for network connectivity
Integrated DDoS mitigation, network firewall, and Zero Trust functionality
Fast routing powered by Argo Smart Routing (roadmap)

planFeatures.title: Zero Trust Free Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure users, devices, and networks with Zero Trust browsing and application access. All of our pricing plans start with the same base set of security controls designed to bring the power of Cloudflare's global edge network.
coreFeatures: Up to 24 hours of logging activity

planFeatures.title: Zero Trust Standard Plan
planFeatures.description: Secure users, devices, and networks with Zero Trust browsing and application access. All of our pricing plans start with the same base set of security controls designed to bring the power of Cloudflare's global edge network.
coreFeatures: Up to 30 days of logging activity

planFeatures.title: Zero Trust Enterprise
planFeatures.description: Secure and accelerate your personal or hobby website.
coreFeatures: Up to 6 months of logging activity
24x7x365 support via phone, tickets, and chat

planFeatures.title: Workers
planFeatures.description: Deploy serverless code instantly across the globe to give it exceptional performance, reliability, and scale.
coreFeatures: Automatic global deployments to hundreds of data centers
High performance runtime with no cold starts
Support for JavaScript and over 10 other languages

planFeatures.title: Pages
planFeatures.description: Cloudflare Pages is a JAMstack platform for frontend developers to collaborate and deploy websites.
coreFeatures: Advanced collaboration built-in with unlimited seats.
Unmatched performance on Cloudflare's edge network.
